title: Causes of French Rev and English Civil War

content.question: Write an essay that: Has a relevant thesis. Addresses all parts of the question. Supports thesis with specific evidence. Is well organized. Analyze how the political and economic problems of the English and French monarchies led to the English Civil War and the French Revolution.

frqParts.text: Write an essay that: Has a relevant thesis. Addresses all parts of the question. Supports thesis with specific evidence. Is well organized. Analyze how the political and economic problems of the English and French monarchies led to the English Civil War and the French Revolution.

topic.text: 3.2: English Civil War and the Glorious Revolution

skill.text: Skill 4.A: Identify and describe a historical context for a specific historical development or process.
